Room.Name: East Grounds
Room.ShortDescription: This is the east side of the Ogden Villa Estate.
Room.LongDescription: The house is palatial in appearance, with at least sixty rooms. A long sun porch, built to catch the morning rays, stretches the length of the mansion on this side. The grounds are beautifully landscaped around a monument and open-air tomb where the founder of the Ogden Dynasty rests.
